readable.title: 3214381315_b54f5c9be4
readable.content: A man hands a child to another man as they exit a boat A man in a blue jacket lifts a child dressed in red out boat crowded with people A man standing on a boat full of people hands a child over to a man that is not on the boat . One man passes a child to another man from the boat to shore . The men are passing a child to each other over the side of the boat .
